description: The BR-30 RTO serves the Sitamarhi district in Bihar, headquartered in the administrative town of Dumra near the Indo-Nepal border. It is responsible for motor vehicle registration, issuance of driving licenses, and enforcement of transport regulations across the district's diverse administrative blocks. The office operates under the Tirhut Division and plays a critical role in managing road safety and transport revenue for this border region.
address: District Transport Office, Collectorate Building, Dumra Road, Behind Court Campus, Dumra, Sitamarhi, Bihar
